website_summaries.verdict: A stable, adjustable model good for multiple ages.
pros: A good value for the price
We love that it can be used by older kids since it adjusts up to 6'
Consumers appreciate the quality, stability, and design
cons: Some had issues with the breakaway rim or net not staying up

customer_reviews.title: Excellent basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: Very nice basketball hoop! Perfect for my tall 4.5yr old, and probably will stay perfect for the next few years. Our smaller basketball hoop (also made by little tikes) has lasted us 3.5yrs, so I'm hoping the new one will too! Highly recommend this product and brand. Assembly was easy, quality feel/appearance, and shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Careful When Adjusting the Height
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 4 and 6 year-old and they LOVE it! The adjustable height is an excellent feature. The only thing I would caution is to warn your kids not to attempt to adjust height on their own - my 4 year-old attempted to lower it and the post slid down fast and pinched his fingers in the groove. I would recommend modifying the post to slide down more slowly for safety reasons. Otherwise, I'm impressed with it's quality and stability and am happy with the purchase! Since it's shared by 2 kids I purchased extra balls and went with Picador Cartoon Design Basketball Size 3 Combo Pack Lion + Elephant and would recommend them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Nice little device for toddlers but needs improvements to be a hoop........
customer_reviews.text: Need some improvements, the basket/breakaway rim is not staying in place and gets flimsy almost at the first shot. Its not sturdy enough to keep it up, the rest is but the breakaway rim itself is or has a very bad/weak design as it does not "lock/snap" in place it's just too weak and the rim/basket is falling down by just minor touch, making it more or less useless as a basketball hoop. It needs to be more sturdy than that to be used as a basketball hoop. Flimsy, flimsy design at that part. Other Little Tikes products we have are all good and sturdy so didn't;t expect this to be soo bad.
customer_reviews.author: bembret

customer_reviews.title: Decent for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Had this for two months. My 2 yr old grandson really likes this. I like that it can be raised as he grows. The ball included is a bit cheesy. We bought him a junior size basketball from Walmart but because it is heavier it collapses the rim after hitting it several times. Now it only takes one hit on the rim to collapse. We put wedges under the rim to keep it from collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: John Kisser

customer_reviews.title: Don't Allow Anyone to Actually Dunk
customer_reviews.text: I like that it adjusts to several heights and it's relatively sturdy. However, the "slam dunk" function is rendered basically useless after 10 times with the basket being dunked on. The basket now hangs at an angle and does not stay up after being hit with the ball one or two times. I'm going to have to figure out a way to keep the basket up permanently or otherwise fix the lip that is supposed to keep the basket up. As such, this functionality is a pretty poor design.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Basketball Set
customer_reviews.text: This set was surprisingly sturdy. It seems more heavy duty that the sets meant for smaller children. The base fills with water or sand to keep it standing for rougher play or outside in the wind. My grandchildren, ages 3 and 4, were thrilled to get it. I purchased a second ball so they can take turns more easily.
customer_reviews.author: icnony

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap on the breakaway rim. After couple days the rim wouldn't stay up and had to put screws in it to stay up.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap on the breakaway rim. After couple days the rim wouldn't stay up and had to put screws in it to stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these for our back play yard, so we have them at 4, 5 and 6 feet. It's good that we can do that because the piece that "secures" the post when the height is moved is very flimsy and doesn't seem long enough to hold it into place - falling each time the ball bumps the post. I have purchased green duct tape to keep the hoops steady at the specific heights. A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Junk hoop
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk, after having this for less then a month the rim won’t stay up. It’s called slam and dunk hoop for a reason. And after contacting “A to Z guarantee” the 3rd party company who sold it, won’t return it or refund my money. So basically I spent money on a hoop to have it for 30 days. Don’t waste your money or buy anything from this 3rd party company.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya

customer_reviews.title: This is a great next step for kids who have outgrown the small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great next step for kids who have outgrown the small Little Tikes hoop. I gave this to a 7-year-old and she will be able to get several years of play out of it before she is too big for it. The base is a little small, but it hasn't been a problem at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Melreview

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 and 2-year-old grandkids. Very easy to put together, simple instructions. Regarding the net issue if you install it as per the directions it stays in place and won't fall off. It's so easy to adjust the height, should get a few years out of it. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Walk

customer_reviews.title: Junk- rim is crooked when up and does not stay up
customer_reviews.text: Clear design flaw. The rim is crooked when it is up, and it drops if the wind blows on it. Little Tykes said to take it up with seller as it is not a warranty claim. No help from them. The engineer that designed this thing should be fired and Little Tykes should be embarrassed as this is garbage right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: PEM

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for a while now and my son loves. It has a good height range for him to grow a decent bit and seems well made. We haven't even put sand in it yet so we could have him play with it in the sun room and still carry it outside sometimes and we've had no issues with it falling over or being sturdy. I *think* you can use a regulation basketball from looking at it although it comes with a small bouncy ball, not a real basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: The basket is nice but has a tendency to fall forward if the ...
customer_reviews.text: The basket is nice but has a tendency to fall forward if the kids do a dunk on it that's too hard. The old one we had did not do that. The kids have adjusted but the base could easily have been made as good as the old one since it's from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 4 year old and he loves it! Right now it's on the lowest level, but it's perfect because we don't need to buy a new one when he gets older since it can go up to 6 feet. Super easy to assemble. You don't need to be worried about children breaking the rim since it's made to come down.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe D

customer_reviews.title: We kept at our house and he shoots for hours plus I like the fact that we can adjust as he gets ...
customer_reviews.text: Got for my cute little19 month old grandson who absolutely loves it. We kept at our house and he shoots for hours plus I like the fact that we can adjust as he gets older!! Definitely satisfied 😁
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Postel

customer_reviews.title: Really worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy even when extended to higher positions. It will grow well with my little guy and keep him challenged.It would be better to have more than one ball with it so if you have more than one child you should buy a few more of the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Lindamac

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, however, we have only had a few months and The rim will not stay up. It keeps falling down making it impossible to play. Super disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amt4bama

customer_reviews.title: Hoop is none too sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part this set is great for the kids, but that darn hoop does not hold it's open position very well. It can barely take 3hits from the ball before its knocked out of place and a "tall" person must come over and reset the hoop.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Good Hoop
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy hoop. The net kept falling off of it so after looping it through as instructed i burned it in place. The boys love it! I have a 9 yr old and a 4 yr old and the ability to change the height makes it enjoyable for both of them. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small backyards.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. I like that I can adjust the height. Very sturdy once you add the water/sand at the bottom. Lost our cover for it though; it kept popping out but that's mostly because of the kids playing with it. Great purchase, great price. Highly recommend. It was raining one day and I even brought it inside the house for the kids to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnt1

customer_reviews.title: Great product, grandkids can’t put it down.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for her grandchildren. I’ve no idea what it does, except I know they’re very excited to always play with it. I guess I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Instantly Broke
customer_reviews.text: This has a breakaway rim, but since the first time the rim 'broke away,' it has never returned to its original position fully.
customer_reviews.author: momma

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my seven year old grandson. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my seven year old grandson. He does not play with it and it think I should have bought a full size one. Appears to be as advertised and the price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: Little tikes has always been a great brand. This basketball hoop was no different. Very easy to put together and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Vopro

customer_reviews.title: Good except the net doesn't keep fit for long
customer_reviews.text: Everything else is good, kids love it except the net. Net doesn't fit well & come out every few minutes. The manual should have been better to cover more details in textual form too. Updating review, net is a pain in the neck, every few minutes it comes out while playing. It's really annoying
customer_reviews.author: Dip

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is as clear of a waste of money as it gets. The rim will not stay up and it’s day 2! It’s really cheap quality. I do not recommend at all! I’m really disappointed and so is my 5 yr old. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Giron

customer_reviews.title: Net design is ridiculous but will stay on easily with a little thread
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 5 year old's birthday. He loves it. So do his big brothers, since their big one is broken at the moment. It is constantly in use on the front driveway by all ages. Net design is ridiculous but will stay on easily with a little thread.
customer_reviews.author: northwest coast

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is great but very quickly the hoop falls and has trouble staying up.
customer_reviews.author: justaguy

customer_reviews.title: The goal will not stay up for regular shooting. ...
customer_reviews.text: The goal will not stay up for regular shooting. I know it has been designed for dunking, but when shooting for afar if ball hits goal, the goal falls down so you have to put it back up after every shot.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Forth

customer_reviews.title: This is a very well made product. Adjustable height ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. Adjustable height. The ball that comes with it is flimsy, so pick up a couple junior size balls when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Great kids hoop
customer_reviews.text: I love that the hoop adjusts and has a breakaway rim. We purchased this for our 2-year old and he loves it. Plus the whole family can join in the fun. It is easy to set up and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: L Capitan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toy for both my 2 year old & my 7 year old sons.
customer_reviews.author: xCrystalBx

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughters (ages 5 and 2) are frustrated by the rim falling so easily! It has to be lifted and then falls again. I complained to the company with no response!
customer_reviews.author: Giovi

customer_reviews.title: Good for little kids
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good basketball hoop, perfect for little kids to practice and play. The only problem is that the blue stickers for the backboard don't fit so we have to overlap them and it takes a few days to stretch the net so the ball goes through the net. But those are only little problems so I am fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids just love this!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered before deadline and my grandkids love this basketball hoop!! They like to adjust the height!! Wish the ball was a little better but other than that it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Delphia Gomez

customer_reviews.title: The goal is super flimsy. It just hangs down
customer_reviews.text: We already had to trash it. The goal is super flimsy. It just hangs down.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this hoop. The only thing that I don't like is the lock on the side comes out easily so the hoop will slam down if it's in a higher position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after my 2.5 yr old decided basketball was the new thing. He LOVES it. The hoop is a bit high on the lowest level but he will grow into it. It was super easy to put together. No tools required. Filled the bottom with playsand and he was off "shooting hoops". Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Fike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy for little kids, plenty of room for enough sand to actually weigh it down and keep it upright. And not very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: James Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my two year old twins for Christmas. It’s great that it adjusts so high and is the perfect height for them. It was a pain to fill with sand but now it’s solid. The basket is a little loose where the plastic holds it up hoping it won’t wear out and the basket won’t stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Rim Rip off
customer_reviews.text: I should have listen to reviews bc this was a waste of my money. After 1 day the rim would stay up & 2 day broke... Disappointed my grandsons😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, took forever to ship!
customer_reviews.text: My friends daughter loves it so far! Got it as a birthday present and she spent the first day playing with it for over an hour and was out of breath and sweating by the time she was done. Worth ever penny!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. All the kids played with it at ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson for his 3 birthday, or maybe 4th. He loved it. All the kids played with it at the party.
customer_reviews.author: richard preslar

customer_reviews.title: great gift for my kids
customer_reviews.text: great gift for my kids. they can even play in the garage when it is too cold outside or if it is raining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's adjustable for a tall  Three and a half year old.
customer_reviews.text: This hoop is great because my Granddaughter is very tall for her age... the toddler ones were too short for her... this one is adjustable and she'll be able to use for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Radonski

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for the little ones.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 3 yr old grandkids love it. I've had no problem with the hoop not staying up. I did buy other balls to use as I wasn't done of the one it came with which was foam, I bought the smaller size Spalding b/ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an Active Toddler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson's 2nd birthday. He loves "backey-ball" and I love that this will grow with him. He will get at least a few good years out of this toy. He can play with it in doors when the weather doesn't permit outside play. What a great investment for an active toddler!
customer_reviews.author: sherengland

customer_reviews.title: Saggy rim
customer_reviews.text: The rim started to sag almost immediately. I think that is a common problem with most of these types of kid hoops. One positive is that the max height is nice and will allow for a couple years of use (once I fix the rim).
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J

customer_reviews.title: kids
customer_reviews.text: kids played with the box more than the goal for several days but its now in their bedroom and have played with it regularly for the past 2 yrs has held up fine
customer_reviews.author: abb

customer_reviews.title: old grand son has lots of fun with this on the low height
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr. old grand son has lots of fun with this on the low height! The ball that comes with it is fairly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: mrt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made - perfect height for 3 up
customer_reviews.text: Great hoop for young players! My 3 year old grandson loves it. It is not too high and just challenging enough to teach him to work at the shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Randie Bradley

customer_reviews.title: My son does love this (he's a very tall 3 year old) however ...
customer_reviews.text: My son does love this (he's a very tall 3 year old) however it only took a couple times using the breakaway rim before it quit locking back into place. Now the rim droops quite noticeably. Disappointing considering it's little tykes and not a bargain brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Dont get the breakaway
customer_reviews.text: The breakaway part does exactly that after using it about 10 times. I have to keep propping the rim up w something.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Seems good enough for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Seems good enough for my 3 year old! He should be able to play with it for a couple more years. Seems well made, although keeping the basket at the tallest setting makes you wish there was supportive notches on both sides and not just one.
customer_reviews.author: P. G

customer_reviews.title: love it. And Dad too
customer_reviews.text: Our boys, aged 3, 6, and 7, love it. And Dad too. My only complaint is it's too easy to take apart... which one of my boys loves to do constantly!
customer_reviews.author: mom3

customer_reviews.title: My grandson will not outgrow this too quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. My grandson will be three soon. He is very tall for his age. I anticipate him using this for a few years. Most reviews I read said they did not receive the ball. I did receive the ball. Great product! Prompt delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Tanoa Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: This is a great goal. i think the best out of all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great goal.i think the best out of all the ones we have bought through the years. I love that you can being inside and outside and it goes to 6' tall. My 10 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson has one that my girlfriend purchased for him that he spends hours playing with so I purchased a second for him to have at home to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well designed, will grow with your kid.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent choice for a beginning and growing basketball player. The goal starts at a toddler-challenging level (and is solid enough to take years of abuse), and can expand to keep them challenged as they grow.
customer_reviews.author: Travis B

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop for the kids to start on
customer_reviews.text: Great hoop for the kids to start on. The hoop itself holds up well but the net not as good of quality. Easy fill spot at the base for sand or water to keep it up right. Great product for a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Height adjust latch falls off.
customer_reviews.text: The latch that holds the basketball pole and makes it adjustable does not stay in place and the tab falls off very easily I will be getting a return on this.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Huang

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice to have a larger base
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to have a larger base. Even when filled with water it tends to tip over when the kids are all shooting at once. I believe they recommend using sand instead of water but we didn't have the sand on hand.
customer_reviews.author: JD Green

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and will work well for older kids (4-8) because it's has adjustable height that goes high. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: captainbob

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay on the height we have it set. Keeps falling down. Plastic is not durable. Filled ours with water and that worked fine. But the rim also falls down frequently. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 3 year old. He loves it and it keeps him active without us having to spend time outside since it's a BILLION DEGREES here in TX. Super easy assembly and it's sturdy. The only issue we have with it is the net comes off very easily. Not a huge issue, though.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got for nephew for his birthday he loved it he turned 4 he will be able to use this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Nickdeyton

customer_reviews.title: She Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old great niece and she LOVES it! Well made.
customer_reviews.author: P. K. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVES it! Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: uphoto75

customer_reviews.title: The hoop doesn't lock in place great at all
customer_reviews.text: The hoop doesn't lock in place great at all. Literally goes down each time a ball hits the rim. Not well designed.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: My 2yr old son loves this! The ball is ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old son loves this! The ball is a lil flimsy do we got him another one (still plastic). But he will play with it for hours! We had to move it outside because he wouldn't give it a break! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Clay

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent and my 2 and 4 year olds are getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how cheap this thing is price wise. The quality is excellent and my 2 and 4 year olds are getting a lot of enjoyment out of it on the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We actually keep it in our foyer. My 4 and 6 year old love it. Keeps them active in the house. Nice quality and love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Break away rim is garbage
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this hoop, but the break away rim is garbage. After repeated slams, the hoop will not stay locked in normal position. Not even a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn V.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product...rim continually collapses.Very disappointed with this name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great for my 5 year old boy. Adjusts pretty high so he will be able to play with this for a long time. It is also pretty sturdy and we used water instead of sand and live in a very windy place.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wolfle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but the top part of goal keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but the top part of goal keeps falling down. Locking mechanism is so so. It will hold for like 20-30 shots then will fall and you have to relock it in the preset positions.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Already trying to play!
customer_reviews.text: Great for toddlers. Adjustable height. Light rubber ball easy for toddlers to maneuver. May outgrow by age 5, but we don't mind!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pole sneered from the base within one month
customer_reviews.text: Had the item 4 months. Put it outside a month ago. The wind blew it over and the pole sheeted off the base. Item is no longer useable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: took the joy out of it when it came as a gift
customer_reviews.text: The ball was flat and would not hold air .... took the joy out of it when it came as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for three year old. Sturdy and easily adjusted. Only problem is chasing older kids off.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. OHara

customer_reviews.title: Break away rim is terrible
customer_reviews.text: My boys are 2 and 4 and after 1 day of use the break away rim will no longer stay up when a ball hits it and the goal is not usable unless I stand behind it and hold the rim in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get zip ties with this to zip ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get zip ties with this to zip tie the netting down... Mine keeps falling off the hoop no matter how tight I have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Starlord

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little more "toddler" than I wanted but they play with it
customer_reviews.author: Doggie Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Will last for a while
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this. I highly recommend. You can is screws on the side to make this even taller.
customer_reviews.author: Kknick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing..
customer_reviews.text: Amazing....I have 3 boys ages 4,2 and 6months and the two oldest love it non stop jumping and playing with it gives me time to take care of things around the house
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for indoor & out. Adjusts easily & stays. Our grandson loves this & played it inside when he was sick on Christmas. Would recommend again & again! Shipped on time & in tact👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in the corner of my office
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in the corner of my office. The ball is pretty bouncy, so using the backboard is kind of an art. It’s a sturdy design: it’s been mashed between the wall and a full grown man several times without any damage to the hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Imhoff

customer_reviews.title: Missing Latch
customer_reviews.text: I will change my rating, until the seller contacts me because I am missing the latch when adjusting the stand. My order arrived on May 28 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but ok
customer_reviews.text: Small kids love it (4 year old twin boys), but cheap adjustment mechanism. It will serve its purpose but does not inspire confidence that height adjustment won't fall.
customer_reviews.author: George Eliot

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this hoop, she's still a bit short at four to use it without the hoop being bent at an angle for her to reach.
customer_reviews.author: T. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Basketball stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We currently have it in the house. The kids love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Stafford

customer_reviews.title: probably not for a 2 year old but she will ...
customer_reviews.text: probably not for a 2 year old but she will grow into in. In the meantime her father is enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Skorepa

customer_reviews.title: ... were looking for and our 3 year old was delighted and plays with it along with his older sister
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for and our 3 year old was delighted and plays with it along with his older sister. And Target even has balls in their dollar section that work perfectly, so we have a whole bunch to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Wm Anthony Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The breakaway rim is a little annoying . I ended up gluing it into position .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It's adjustable for their heights and is easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My two year old and four year both place with this on a regular basis. It's adjustable for their heights and is easy to put together. Great Chrisymas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good for my son
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves this basketball hoop for fun in our backyard.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Way easy to set up, way durable, not cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: MButch

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A great item - assembles in minutes. Lots of fun - even grown ups play with it at my house! This amuses my son for hours!

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I like this basket ball goal. It was a Christmas present for my six year old. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson McEldery

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Adjust and Jam Pro Basketball Set, Blue
product_meta.description:
Kids can get their game on with the Adjust 'n Jam Pro basketball set! The adjustable hoop has five different settings to create the right amount of challenge. It grows with your child, so your little one will go from toddler to all-star. This basketball set introduces competitive play while the child builds motor skills. The kid-sized ball makes it easy to shoot.

Features:


-5-heights from 4 to 6 feet

-Breakaway rim

-A kid-sized basketball

-The base must be weighted with sand for stability (not included)

-Assembly Required


BRAND STORY
By Little Tikes
feature_bullets: 5 height adjustments ranging from 4 - 6 feet tall^Indoor or outdoor use^Includes a breakaway rim^Weight the base with sand (not included) for stability^Includes: 1 Adjust 'n Jam Pro basketball hoop, 1 basketball net, 1 junior-sized basketball
